Blogs.Title: IA
Blogs.Description: The use of artificial neural networks to create chatbots is increasingly popular nowadays, however, teaching a computer to have natural conversations is very difficult and often requires large and complicated language models.

Projects.Title: Telegram chat-bot
Projects.Description: The use of artificial neural networks to create chatbots is increasingly popular nowadays, however, teaching a computer to have natural conversations is very difficult and often requires large and complicated language models.

Insights.Name: Demis Hassabis  CEO DeepMind
Insights.Title: Transfer Learning
Insights.Description: I think transfer learning is the key to general intelligence. And I think the key to doing transfer learning will be the acquisition of conceptual knowledge that is abstracted away from perceptual details of where you learned it from.

Insights.Name: Marvin Minksy
Insights.Title: Continually Innovate
Insights.Description:
I noticed that most people do something wonderful and then they get stuck. I started to make theories on how people get stuck and how to avoid it. 
And the best way is: if you've done something. you should be ashamed of it, instead of proud of it.

Insights.Name: Geoffrey Hinton
Insights.Title: Future of AI
Insights.Description: Assuming the computer industry can keep producing better hardware. I think 'business as usual' is going to take us a long way. Obviously, if we get big conceptual breakthroughts, it'll take us further. I think one of the big breakthroughts that's going to come is we're going to understand the brain.
